name: Lord of Mine
description:
A 2D & FPS & RPG game for Ludum Dare 48.

The RPG part and economic system has yet been finished in this Jam version.

---------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY:

click the "structural weakpoints" of enemies, so that they could be hurt.

There are also three tools help our miner to smash enemy quickly.

A - Quick and multiple hits with your pickaxe

S - Bomb, if you could hit 3 weakpoints at same time, the enemy will be destructed completely

D - Heavy Hit with very great power. Click left-button of mouse will start aiming progress, please click left-button again when the aiming circle is in its smallest shape.This will eliminate enemy completely if any weakpoint has been exactly hit.
